headline: Should Sector-Wide Mortgage-Rate Jitters Outweigh D.R. Horton’s (DHI) Reaffirmed 2026 Guidance?
summary: D.R. Horton recently reiterated its full-year 2026 guidance, yet its shares came under pressure as homebuilder peers reacted to softer housing-demand signals and cautious commentary from major home-improvement retailers about elevated mortgage rates and weak housing turnover. The key angle for investors is that sentiment around sector-wide affordability and mortgage-rate pressures is weighing more heavily than company-specific guidance, even as analyst expectations for D.R. Horton’s upcoming...
